main event: A bright, almost blinding light was observed traveling at a very rapid speed in Watertown, South Dakota on March 2-5, 1965.
interesting points: The object was circular in shape and disappeared from sight in 15-20 seconds.
The witness could not make out anything other than the intense light, which appeared to be located on some kind of object.
The object moved at approximately the speed of a small jet aircraft.
The object was estimated to be around 1 mile away from the witness.
The object appeared suddenly and then descended vertically, disappearing from view.
